items.name: xflow.license.file
items.label: Xflow License File
items.helpText: LM_LICENSE_FILE:full path to the XFLOW license file. 1555@chnshas1016

data.doc:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<descriptor id="XFLOW" filled="true">
	<options name="schedule.parameter" info="Schedule Parameter" id="sche" narrow="false">
		<option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" name="job.name" label="Job Name" id="JOB_NAME" hidden="false"></option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="core.number" label="Core" id="NCPU" hidden="false">
            <option selected="false" id="2">2</option>
            <option selected="true" id="4">4</option>
            <option selected="false" id="6">6</option>
            <option selected="false" id="8">8</option>
            <option selected="false" id="16">16</option>
        </option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="queue" label="Queue" id="QUEUE" hidden="false" defaultValue="normal">
            <option selected="false" id="xflow_high">xflow_high</option>
            <option selected="true" id="xflow_low">xflow_low</option>
        </option>
	</options>

	<options name="inputfile.parameter" info="Input File" id="file" narrow="false">
		<option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" width="42" required="false" name="computing.input.file" label="Input File(.stl .step .stp)" id="TXT_INPUT_FILE" hidden="false"></option>
	</options>

	<options name="install.application.parameter" info="Install Application Parameters" id="mandatory">
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" name="xflow.command" label="Xflow Command" id="XFLOW_CMD" hidden="false" helpText="XFLOW_CMD:Fluent install directory. For exsample:/app/xflow_inc/v121/fluent/bin/fluent"></option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" name="xflow.license.file" label="Xflow License File" id="LM_LICENSE_FILE" hidden="false" helpText="LM_LICENSE_FILE:full path to the XFLOW license file. 1555@chnshas1016"></option>
    </options>
</descriptor>
